 2. Spearheaded variance analysis of line items of profit and loss and balance sheet, determined root cause for each significant variance and suggested cost saving opportunities

column62:
I am a professional with principle to do any work with utmost precision and excellence. With this value, I have earned several credentials over my professional and academic tenure. 
 
 I am a CA & CS Professional, with core specialization in Audit, assurance, IFRS, Tax and Financial reporting. My initial years have marked merits in school in every standard. I scored 10 CGPA in 10th and 94.6% in 12th and becoming the school topper. I have always indulged in public speaking as a medium to express the ideas eloquently. 
 
 I then chose to pursue career in Finance and audit starting CA & CS I have garnered valuable skills of Advanced Excel, IFRS, Financial analysis, Corporate Finance, ERP and extraordinary communication.
 
  I have been a star employee leading the team to establish extremely great results within the deadlines. I am always sparked by the idea to create diverse value addition wherever I am with collaboration and fostering bright relationships.
 
 In the leisure time, I love to do gardening and solve sudoku.
